items.sentence: I haven\'t done my homework yet, and Tom hasn\'t either.
Let\'s ask Tom if he\'d like to play volleyball with us.
Tom ate only three or four bites then spit out the food.
When spring comes, they plow the fields and plant seeds.
I can\'t be there myself, so I\'ll send Tom to help you.
Tom said he didn\'t think he\'d ever be able to do that.
Tom didn\'t have to come here. He could\'ve just called.
Is there anybody here who can explain what\'s happening?
It\'s getting colder, but we still have mosquitoes here.
I had no idea that you didn\'t know how to speak French.
